physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Dalhousie Monument, Town Hall and Library in Singapore. In the center of the photograph, there is a tall memorial obelisk sitting on top of a flight of steps with a circular gate around it. Behind the monument, there are several large grand buildings with European neoclassical architecture. The top-right of the photograph is slightly folded. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Dalhousie Monument, Town Hall and Library, Singapore
